unnormalised: Regarding the upcoming conference, please note that the deadline for abstract submissions has been extended to 15/07/2024. The organizing committee anticipates sending acceptance notifications by 22/07/2024. The conference itself is scheduled from 05/08/2024 to 07/08/2024, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM daily. Delegates are requested to confirm their attendance by 29/07/2024 to ensure logistical arrangements, including catering and seating, can be finalized. We look forward to welcoming you.
normalised: Regarding the upcoming conference, please note that the deadline for abstract submissions has been extended to fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four. The organizing committee anticipates sending acceptance notifications by twenty second July two thousand and twenty four. The conference itself is scheduled from fifth August two thousand and twenty four to seventh August two thousand and twenty four, nine A-M to five P-M daily. Delegates are requested to confirm their attendance by twenty ninth July two thousand and twenty four to ensure logistical arrangements, including catering and seating, can be finalized. We look forward to welcoming you.
